author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Annual Cool Octoberfest Concert And Festival Returans to Four Seasons Resort And Club Dallas At Las CollinasTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Annual Cool Octoberfest Concert And Festival Returans to Four Seasons Resort And Club Dallas At Las Collinas
Mark the calendar as Four Seasons Resort and Club Dallas at Las Colinas invites the community to help fight cancer for a healthier Irving by bringing family and friends to an evening of live music, food, drinks, fireworks and fun on Saturday, September 19, from 6:30 to 10:00 pm at Four Seasons Golf School and Driving Range.
Local 80’s party band LIVE 80 will provide the soundtrack to the 2nd annual Cool Octoberfest Concert and Festival, so bring those dancing shoes. Donations are welcome at the door and throughout the concert venue with all proceeds benefitting the Irving Healthcare Foundation in support of cancer services at the Baylor Scott & White Charles A. Sammons Cancer Center. Patrons are encouraged to bring chairs and blankets to the event. Food trucks will be on site and alcohol will be for sale at the Beer Garden.
Schedule of Events:
6:30 pm – Doors open, Chili Cookoff judging begins
7:30 pm – LIVE 80 (with break-dancers!)
8:30 pm – Chili Cookoff winner announcement
9:45 pm – Fireworks Show
Attractions:
Food trucks
Beer Garden
Kids’ activities presented by Baylor Scott & White – Irving
Bounce houses
Fireworks
Live music
Chili Cookoff
Brats celebrating Oktoberfest
Source:- Four Season Resort
